name: monologue-raycast-ext
title: Monologue
description: Quick access to Monologue voice transcripts
author: aliou

commands.name: transcript-history
commands.title: Transcript History
commands.subtitle: Monologue
commands.description: View and search all Monologue transcripts with actions to paste, copy, or play audio

commands.name: paste-last-transcript
commands.title: Paste Last Transcript
commands.subtitle: Monologue
commands.description: Immediately paste the most recent Monologue transcript

commands.name: paste-last-raw-transcript
commands.title: Paste Last Raw Transcript
commands.subtitle: Monologue
commands.description: Paste the raw (unprocessed) text of the most recent transcript

commands.name: copy-last-transcript
commands.title: Copy Last Transcript
commands.subtitle: Monologue
commands.description: Copy the most recent Monologue transcript to clipboard

commands.name: refresh-database
commands.title: Refresh Database
commands.subtitle: Monologue
commands.description: Force rebuild the transcript database from source

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
